arStrings.szText: {c_important}Lightning Storm{/c} Critical Strikes spawn {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} {c_important}Dancing Bolts{/c} that seek enemies in the area dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage.

{c_important}Lightning Storm{/c} Critical Strikes spawn {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} {c_important}Dancing Bolts{/c} that deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage.
